price: (Nkͻmhyεni), mfatoho biara a wͻde bεba (abεko atia) woͻ (anaa wͻde bɛsum wo fidie) no, Yεde nokorε no a (wode bɛyi wͻn ano) ne nkyerεkyerεmu pa paa bεberε wo.
arabic: وَلَا يَأۡتُونَكَ بِمَثَلٍ إِلَّا جِئۡنَٰكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَأَحۡسَنَ تَفۡسِيرًا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walā yatūnaka bimathalin illā ji'nāka bil-ḥaqi wa-aḥsana tafsīran
